switch_network_tips: Please select the network you want to switch to in the list below
switch_network_loading: Please confirm the network switching request in MetaMask...
network_does_not_match: Network does not match! Please choose a network below to switch
json_unsupported_bigint_tips: JSON does not support bigint, bigint will be converted to string for display
you_can_choose: You can choose the following operations
choose_1: Use the test contract provided by the system to experience
choose_2: Provide contract address, contract ABI and other information to add a new contract
abi_placeholder: ABI of the contract, it should be an array
base_on_tips: The network where the contract is deployed, optional. Multiple selections are allowed. A network check will be performed when the contract is called. No check will be performed if not selected.
data_structure_as: The data structure is as follows
upload_json_tips_2: file to this area to upload
paste_abi_placeholder: Please enter data that matches the rules
start_0x_len_le_max: Must start with 0x and length less than or equal to {maxLen}
custom_network_tips_1: Don't have the network you need? Try
No_RPC_provided: No RPC provided for {network}, You need to add the network in MetaMask and then switch the network.
network_select_placeholder: Please select the network for contract deployment (Optional or Multiple )
